lead_paragraph: BASSETT--Leslie. The American Academy of Arts and Letters notes with sorrow the death of our esteemed colleague, the Pulitzer Prize-winning composer Leslie Bassett, whose nobility of spirit is exemplified both in his music and his person. 1/3
